channel.description: Recent content in Xp on Wildan's Blog

item.title: PPI-IIUM Producation 2018: Finding Passion in University
item.description: Earlier this week, I received an invitation from Persatuan Pelajar Indonesia (PPI) –– an Indonesian Students Society at my campus (IIUM, Malaysia), to become a speaker of a sharing session event titled “Producation”. The event will be held at IIUM this coming Friday, March 30.
